definitions: a trend in sculpture and painting that arose in the 1950s and used simple, typically massive, forms.
shortDefinitions: movement in sculpture and painting which arose in 1950s

definitions: an avant-garde movement in music characterized by the repetition of very short phrases which change gradually, producing a hypnotic effect.
shortDefinitions: avant-garde movement in music characterized by repetition of very short phrases which change gradually, producing hypnotic effect
